title: Account Executive
text:
Account Executive
Reed Business Support
We are delighted to recruiting for a new role for an Account Executive. This is a great opportunity to join a business with real career progression to an Account Manager role and beyond.
The role will involve daily management of customer accounts and creating new opportunities. This is a sales based role and requires someone with relationship management and development skills. Someone who is not afraid to call and introduce themselves to a business and seek out potential new business opportunities.
The day to day workload will be focussed around working to briefs, creating quotations, pitching to clients, negotiation, forecasting, relationship management and following processes, protocols and related administration. You will be a focused and driven sales person with the appetite to grow existing business but go after new opportunities with a proven track record in sales orientated environment.
If you are looking for a role to develop your career and are willing to learn and work hard to progress, this is a fantastic opportunity. We are looking for someone who is maybe currently working as a Junior Account manager or Account Manager or is working within a projects based role. You will have excellent attention to detail, a strong commercial focus, confident communication skills, be very well organised and adaptable.
Please apply online with your up to date CV so we may contact you for a more detailed conversation about the role.
Reference: 51862668
Please note
Reed.co.uk does not communicate with candidates via Whatsapp, and we will never ask you to provide your bank, passport or driving licence details during the application process.
